original_text: Is this blessedness only for the circumcised, or also for the uncircumcised? We have been saying that Abraham’s faith was credited to him as righteousness.
korean_text: 그런즉 이 복이 할례자에게냐 혹은 무할례자에게도냐 무릇 우리가 말하기를 아브라함에게는 그 믿음이 의로 여겨졌다 하노라

sentences.original_text: Is this blessedness only for the circumcised,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 축복이 할례받은 자들만을 위한 것입니까,
아니면 할례받지 않은 자들을 위한 것도입니까?

sentences.original_text: was credited to him as righteousness.
